es.upm.dit.gsi.shanks.agent.capability.reasoning.bayes
Class ShanksAgentBayesianReasoningCapability

java.lang.Object
  es.upm.dit.gsi.shanks.agent.capability.reasoning.bayes.ShanksAgentBayesianReasoningCapability

public class ShanksAgentBayesianReasoningCapability
extends Object

This class defines the behavior of an agent that inherits Bayesian Reasoning Capability.

Author:
a.carrera
